sn45.161:1.6: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.161:1.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ …pe… sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn45.161:1.9: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:2.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.161:2.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti …pe… sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti rāgavinayapariyosānaṃ dosavinayapariyosānaṃ mohavinayapariyosānaṃ.
sn45.161:2.8: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:3.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.161:3.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti …pe… sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti amatogadhaṃ amataparāyanaṃ amatapariyosānaṃ.
sn45.161:3.8: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:4.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.161:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti …pe… sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇaṃ nibbānapabbhāraṃ.
sn45.161:4.8: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ abhiññāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:5.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ pariññāya …pe… ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:6.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ parikkhayāya …pe… ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabboti.
sn45.161:7.5: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.161:7.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti …pe… sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ …
sn45.161:7.8: Imāsaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tissannaṃ esanānaṃ pahānāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo”ti.
